name: Snort
short_description: Fast and lightweight Nostr web client built with React for easy network interaction.
description: Fast and lightweight Nostr web client built with React for easy network interaction. Snort is a self-hosted application focused on social, security, network, firewall. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Snort on your home server to fast and lightweight nostr web client built with react for easy network interaction without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Snort to manage your social workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
